  25. (* [cleanup e f x] runs evaluates [f x] and reraises [e] with its original
  26.    backtrace. If [f x] raises, then [e] is not raised. *)
  27. ‌val cleanup : exn -> (unit -> unit) -> 'a

  29. (*** Operations on lists. ***)

  31. (* Remove an element from a list *)
  32. ‌val except : 'a -> 'a list -> 'a list

  34. (* Position of an element in a list. Head of list has position 0. *)
  35. ‌val index : 'a -> 'a list -> int

  37. (* Return the `n' first elements of `l'. *)
  38. (* ### n l -> l' *)
  39. ‌val list_truncate : int -> 'a list -> 'a list

  41. (* Separate the `n' first elements of `l' and the others. *)
  42. (* ### n list -> (first, last) *)
  43. ‌val list_truncate2 : int -> 'a list -> 'a list * 'a list

  45. (* Replace x by y in list l *)
  46. (* ### x y l -> l' *)
  47. ‌val list_replace : 'a -> 'a -> 'a list -> 'a list

  49. (*** Operations on strings. ***)

  51. (* Remove blanks (spaces and tabs) at beginning and end of a string. *)
  52. ‌val string_trim : string -> string

  54. (* isprefix s1 s2 returns true if s1 is a prefix of s2. *)
  55. ‌val isprefix : string -> string -> bool
